TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeIdentifiers extends System.Object

summary.span: 维护相关代码实体或类型映射的一组名称，这些名称是 .NET Framework 的 XML 序列化基础结构生成的。

span.span: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表标识工具和类使用:The following list identifies tools and classes that use the : - [Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，或类，从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时。The [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - [XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)时从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档生成类的工具。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) tool while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. - 时创建的类对象标识为通过 Web 服务的类从属性。The class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services via the attribute. 而不是使用直接类中，使用前面提到的工具或类。Instead of using the class directly, use the aforementioned tools or classes. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes. 具体取决于其作用域内，实例可用于维护的任何以下列表中的项名称：Depending on its scope, a instance can be used to maintain the names of any of the items in the following list: - 类型、 方法或字段。Types, methods, or fields. - 参数和返回值对应于 WSDL 方法的输入和输出消息。The parameters and return value of a method corresponding to WSDL input and output messages. - 中的对象可以序列化为 WSDL 文档的实例。Objects within a instance that can be serialized to a WSDL document. 通常情况下，类用于避免命名冲突之间在特定范围内，其中包括包含实体的名称冲突的代码实体。Typically, the class is used to avoid naming collisions between code entities within a particular scope, including collisions with the name of a containing entity.

span.span: if identifiers are case sensitive; otherwise, .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and determines whether code identifiers are case sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Add (identifier As String, value As Object)
public: void Add(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用于对代码实体进行索引的名称。

span.span: A name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 代码实体或类型映射信息。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 将命名的代码实体或类型映射添加到 实例的范围中。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同方法，方法不会阻止命名冲突。Unlike the method, the method does not prevent naming collisions. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性而不是创建实例的类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddReserved(string identifier) cil managed

param.name: identifier
param.span: 将在 实例的范围中不可用的名称。

span.span: A name that will not be available within the instance's scope.

summary.span: 防止在 实例的范围中使用指定的名称。

span.span: Prevents a specified name from being used within the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留的名称可以属于包含的代码实体，如为其还必须生成成员名称的类型。A reserved name can belong to a containing code entity, such as a type for which member names must also be generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AddUnique (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance string AddUnique(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Function AddUnique (identifier As String, value As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ AddUnique(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: 用于对代码实体进行索引的候选名称。

span.span: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: 代码实体或类型映射信息。

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: 将命名的代码实体或类型映射添加到 实例的范围中，确保名称在该范围内是唯一的。

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.

returns.span: 标识符参数值；如果存在名称冲突，则为修改后的字符串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标识符参数值不是唯一内生成和使用在其原位置实例的范围，是新的唯一字符串。If the identifier parameter value is not unique within the instance's scope, a new, unique string is generated and used in its place. 通过将追加到输入的名称生成的新字符串。The new string is generated by appending to the input name. 原始名称不唯一，如果以前已传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由以前调用生成方法。The original name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by a previous call to the method. 在每种情况下，如果新的标识符不是唯一的它首先传递给方法来创建新的唯一标识符。In each case, if the new identifier is not unique, it is first passed to the method to create a new unique identifier. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性而不是创建实例的类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从 实例的范围中移除所有代码实体或类型映射，包括它们的名称。

span.span: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留名称，如通过添加方法，不会删除。Reserved names, as added through the method, are not removed. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性而不是创建实例的类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

Public Function IsInUse (identifier As String) As Boolean

param.name: identifier
param.span: 要检查是否已在 实例的范围中使用的名称。

span.span: The name to check for use within the instance's scope.

span.span: Determines whether a specified name is already being used within the instance's scope.

returns.span: 如果名称已使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the name is already in use; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的名称不唯一，如果以前已传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由生成方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性而不是创建实例的类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeRightCase(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeRightCase (identifier As String) As String

span.span: The name to possibly modify.

summary.span: 根据 属性的值修改名称，以确保输入的大小写正确。

span.span: Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the property.

returns.span: 与输入标识符相同（或改变了首字母的大小写）的字符串。

span.span: A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值属性是`true`和输入的第一个字符是一个字母，它由小写字母，如有必要。If the value of the property is `true` and the first character of the input is a letter, it is made lowercase, if necessary. 如果的值是`false`，实际上是 Pascal 大小写的第一个字符是字母，如果采用大写形式，如有必要。If the value of the is `false`, Pascal case is in effect and the first character, if a letter, is capitalized, if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeUnique(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeUnique (identifier As String) As String

param.name: identifier
param.span: 要修改的名称（如果不唯一）。

span.span: The name to modify if it is not already unique.

summary.span: 确定输入名称是否与 实例范围中的其他名称冲突，如果是，则生成修改的字符串。

span.span: Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.

returns.span: 标识符参数值；如果存在名称冲突，则为修改后的字符串。

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的名称不唯一，如果以前已传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由生成方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果名称不是唯一的生成一个新的字符串将追加到原始字符串。If the name is not unique, a new string is generated by appending to the original string. 如果你想要的控件绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的代码实体的名称，使用关联的属性而不是创建实例的类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCamelCasing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCamelCasing : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示实例是否使用 camel 大小写。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.

value.span: 如果指示实例使用 camel 大小写，则为 ；如果指示实例使用 Pascal 大小写，则为 。

span.span: to indicate that the instance uses camel case; to indicate that the instance uses Pascal case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用混合大小写，如果标识符的第一个字符是一个字母，它必须为小写。With camel case, if the first character of an identifier is a letter, it must be lowercase. 使用 Pascal 大小写，如果第一个字符是一个字母，它必须是大写。With Pascal case, if the first character is a letter, it must be uppercase.
